summary: Death Skeletons 4096x4096 Reslution BY GameNinjaPro is a complete New skeleton Retexture To and amazing quality of 4096x4096 compacted down in to a 2046x2046 size texture that still retains the quality of a 4096 image :D for this mod
descriptionHtml:
LOOk AT PICS TO SEE!!!!

Death Skeletons 4096x4096 Reslution BY GameNinjaPro is a complete New skeleton Retexture To and amazing quality of 4096x4096 compacted down in to a 2046x2046 size texture that still retains the quality of a 4096 image :D. for this mod the texture of the skeletons are much darker and feel a bit more \"Badass \"

The idea for this mod was to improve the qualtiy and make the skeletons feel more detailed and evil like. i was dissapointed that bethesda used such low rez textures for these undead walking bones. so i deside to take it upon my self and redo theses poor textures and make them more eye appealing andto make them feel darker and \"eviler\". if thats even a word :D 

installing : This is pretty simple guys :). all u do is take the texture file \"skeleton\" and place it in the Textures/Actors file. if u dont have the actors file in ur texture directory. just create it and place skeleton file inside and ur ready to go

Features:
:4096x4096 compacted down in to a 2046x2046 size texture that still retains the quality of a 4096 image
:better eyecandy appeal

Updates : There will be updates to come and new diffrent colours if u guys request them

Credits: GameNinjaPro AND DONT FORGET TO INDORSE AND PLEASE LeAVE A COMMENT ON UR IDEAS AND FEEDBACK

Cheers guys :D

IF u like this Mod Check OUT MY 2048 Azuras star Texture
author: GameNinjaPro
